short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension for Creating and Editing SVG

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Simple and easy to use SVG maker and SVG Editor. 
Features:
---------------------
Options to open and ungroup svg files and edit each layer. After editing file can be saved as SVG or PNG.
Option to create SVG file from scratch .
 Free drawing , polygon drawing , polygon edit are supported.
Icons , Shapes and Text can be added.
